verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Simameni watu wota leo katika nyumba ya Bwana (wote)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Furahini mbele zake Bwana imbeni nyimbo za shangwe
(shangilieni)

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Akina baba wote njoni wote mbele za Bwana mkiimba nyiombo za shangwe

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: njoni wote mbele za Bwana njoni leo mbarikiwe.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: (njooni nyote mbele za Bwana mkiimba nyimbo za shangwe)*2

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: 3.Watoto wetu wote njooni mbele zake njooni njooni

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: mwimbieni wimbo mpya (chezeni mbele za Bwana)*2

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
4.Ni siku ya furaha (leo)*3 ni siku yenye heri
Tumshukuru muumba wetu tumsifu mwenyezi Mungu

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: tumshukuru muumba wetu tucheze ngoma na vinanda.
